channel.title: GranD ThefT AutO NewS
channel.description: This is a page of gta related news where you get up-to-dated with gta franchise.

item.title: Liberty City
item.description: Niko Bellic (Serbian: Нико Белић, Niko Belić) is the protagonist of Grand Theft Auto IV and a supporting character in The Lost and Damned and The Ballad of Gay Tony.

item.title: GTA SAN ANDREAS
item.description: The State of San Andreas, also known as the San Andreas Republic is a fictional state located in the southwestern United States of America, featured in Grand Theft Auto V and Grand Theft Auto Online. San Andreas is closely based on real-life Southern California.
